scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:api
scripts.setup:api: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? require('child_process').execSync('npm run setup:api:win') : require('child_process').execSync('npm run setup:api:unix')"
scripts.setup:venv: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? require('child_process').execSync('npm run setup:venv:win') : require('child_process').execSync('npm run setup:venv:unix')"
scripts.setup: npm run setup:venv && npm install && npm run setup:api && npm run install:all
